title: I have an iPhone XR, should I get the iPhone 11 Pro or Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why is there something wrong with XR? Let's take it a step further you decide to get the I phone pro 11 Terrific camera your are glad you made the decision. Sept 2020. I phone 12 is released and you have had the I phone 11 for a year what should you do Apple and other companies. Have to keep bringing out products every year with some new feature we the buying public will never catch up it's a expensive game costing thousands of dollars I have had my Apple I phone model SE since 2013 its working and performs all the functions a I phone supposed to do one day it will need service and at that time I will replace the iPhone

The 11 is a very close matchup to what you have. The 11 pro is smaller, and a little faster with ultra wide zoom camera. The 11 pro Mac is bigger with the same perks. The 11 is much less with wide zoom and 1x zoom (no 2x zoom) do there 11 has an added camera to the XR lineup, which provides the ultra wide zoom capability. I would recommend keeping what you have, and upgrade next year.
